body_html: @SeanNaren, I think no changes have to be made as long as you don't touch w_hi, everything should just work automagically, but you can experiment with cudnn v6 yourself (link for downloading it can be found in tools/docker/Dockerfile_v6).
body_text: @SeanNaren, I think no changes have to be made as long as you don't touch w_hi, everything should just work automagically, but you can experiment with cudnn v6 yourself (link for downloading it can be found in tools/docker/Dockerfile_v6).
body: @SeanNaren, I think no changes have to be made as long as you don't touch w_hi, everything should just work automagically, but you can experiment with cudnn v6 yourself (link for downloading it can be found in tools/docker/Dockerfile_v6).
